0.title: Project One
0.description: A full-featured web application developed using React and Firebase, featuring real-time data synchronization, user authentication, and cloud-based storage. Ideal for collaborative environments and productivity tools.

1.title: Project Two
1.description: A modern, responsive landing page created with React, animated transitions using Framer Motion, and multilingual support via i18next. Designed to provide a seamless user experience across devices and languages.

2.title: Project Three
2.description: A sleek portfolio website showcasing creative work and client projects, built with React and styled-components. Includes a custom image gallery, dynamic contact form, and optimized performance for SEO.
